name: Baleful Miasma
condition_immunities: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, unconscious

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 6 (1d6+3) bludgeoning damage + 3 (1d6) poison.

special_abilities.name: Air Form
special_abilities.desc: Can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. Can move through space as narrow as 1ft. wide with o squeezing.

special_abilities.name: Asphyxiate
special_abilities.desc: If a creature that breathes air starts its turn in miasma's space it must make DC 12 Con save or begin suffocating as its lungs fill with the poisonous air emitted by the miasma. Suffocation lasts until creature ends its turn in a space not occupied by baleful miasma or the baleful miasma dies. When the suffocation ends the creature is poisoned until the end of its next turn.

special_abilities.name: Elemental Nature
special_abilities.desc: Doesn't require air food drink or sleep.
